verses.verse: But it happened that when Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that we were building <S%H1129><s%> the wall, <S%H2346><s%> he was angry, <S%H2734><s%> and took great <S%H7235><s%> indignation, <S%H3707><s%> and mocked <S%H3932><s%> the Jews. <S%H3064><s%>

don't <S%H3680><s%> cover their iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and don't <S%H2403><s%> let their sin be blotted out <S%H4229><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you; <S%H3707><s%> for they have insulted the builders. <S%H1129><s%>"

But it happened that when Sanballat, <S%H5571><s%> Tobiah, <S%H2900><s%> the Arabians, <S%H6163><s%> the Ammonites, <S%H5984><s%> and the Ashdodites <S%H796><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that the repairing of the walls <S%H2346><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> went forward, <S%H724><s%> and that the breaches <S%H6555><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to be filled, <S%H5640><s%> then they were very <S%H3966><s%> angry; <S%H2734><s%>

But we made our prayer <S%H6419><s%> to our God, <S%H430><s%> and set <S%H5975><s%> a watch <S%H4929><s%> against them day <S%H3119><s%> and night, <S%H3915><s%> because of them. <S%H6440><s%>

Therefore set <S%H5975><s%> I in the lowest <S%H8482><s%> parts <S%H4725><s%> of the space behind <S%H310><s%> the wall, <S%H2346><s%> in the open places, <S%H6706><s%> I set <S%H5975><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%> with their swords, <S%H2719><s%> their spears, <S%H7420><s%> and their bows. <S%H7198><s%>

It happened, <S%H341><s%> when our enemies heard <S%H8085><s%> that it was known <S%H3045><s%> to us, <S%H430><s%> and God had brought <S%H6565><s%> their counsel <S%H6098><s%> to nothing, <S%H6565><s%> that we returned <S%H7725><s%> all of us to the wall, <S%H2346><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> to his work. <S%H4399><s%>

I said <S%H559><s%> to the nobles, <S%H2715><s%> and to the rulers <S%H5461><s%> and to the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> "The work <S%H4399><s%> is great <S%H7235><s%> and large, <S%H7235><s%> and we are separated <S%H6504><s%> on the wall, <S%H2346><s%> one <S%H376><s%> far from <S%H7350><s%> another. <S%H251><s%>
